name: Adpocalypse: The Machine Revolution
description:
Try to survive a horde of crazy murderous robots while being bombarded by annoying ads

Controls: Left and Right Mouse buttons shoot in their respective directions, you can use the Left Mouse button to close ads, you can't shoot while an ad is on the screen, some ads may be useful, try buying some from time to time.

Made by two people, you can find us on instagram, code by @whitelotuspa and art by @boxoftales <3
